H0.text: In cones, the first seed plants formed seeds.

H1.text: In leaves, the first seed plants formed seeds.

H2.text: In folds, the first seed plants formed seeds.

H3.text: In stems, the first seed plants formed seeds.

A4.text: In some species of conifer, the seeds become covered by the cone scales as they develop.

A5.text: In gymnosperms, no special structure develops to enclose the seeds, which begin their development 'naked' on the bracts of cones.
